css_definition: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Josefin Sans');.form {background: linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(0,0,0,0), rgba(0,0,0,0));align-items: center;margin-left: 0%;width: 100%; font-family: Josefin Sans;color: black;font-weight: 500;} h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, a, textarea, input[type=text], .select2-container input[type=text], .select2-choices, .select2-choices input .select2-input, .form-control, .footer {font-family: Josefin Sans;color: black;font-weight: 600;} p, .btn {font-family: Josefin Sans;font-weight: 600;}.header h1 {font-family: Josefin Sans;font-weight: 600;font-size: 4.5vw;text-align: left;color: black;padding-top: 5px;} hr {border: 1px solid black;width: 100%;} .header {display: fixed;} @media only screen and (max-width:1100px) {.header {padding: 0px;padding-bottom: 0px;padding-top:0px;}} @media only screen and (max-width:1100px) {.form {width: 100% !important;margin-left: 0% !important;}hr {width: 100% !important;margin-left: 0px !important;}}@media only screen and (max-width:600px) {.header h1 {display: fixed; font-family: Josefin Sans;font-weight: 500;font-size: 30px !important;text-align: left;color: black;padding-top: 5px;margin-left: 0px;}} .btn {width:120px !important;}}.social_links {text-align: center;display: flex;justify-content: center;align-items: center;margin-top: 10px;}.social_links a {text-align: center;text-decoration: underline;font-family: Josefin Sans;font-size: 16px;border: 0px solid white;color: blue;}.select2-search-choice-close {border: 0px solid white !important;padding: 0px !important;} .footer {text-align: center;color: white;padding-bottom: 20px;margin-bottom: -20px;margin-top: 0px;font-size: 14px;background-color: black;padding-top: 20px;}
